snippet: Prince Turki al-Faisal, a former intelligence chief, said efforts to secure a peace deal between Israelis and Palestinians would founder without clear commitment from President Obama.
abstract: Prince Turki al-Faisal, former intelligence chief of Saudi Arabia, blasts Obama administration for indecision and loss of credibility with Middle East allies, saying American efforts to secure a peace deal between Israelis and Palestinians cannot succeed without clear commitment from Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: Prince Turki al-Faisal, a former intelligence chief, said efforts to secure a peace deal between Israelis and Palestinians would founder without clear commitment from President Obama.

headline.main: Saudi Prince Criticizes Obama Administration, Citing Indecision in Mideast
headline.print_headline: Saudi Prince Criticizes Obama Administration, Citing Indecision in Mideast
